content.title: Advisory to all Hostellers of NIT Agartala
content.note: The unreadable portion has been omitted as it appears to be garbled text.
content.instructions: Students may prepone or postpone their tickets. It is issued based on the verbal instruction of competent authority.
copy_to: The Registrar, NIT Agartala for kind information to the Director.
Associate Deans (Students' Welfare) for information and necessary action.
System Administrator - to upload on Institute website.
